Thu Dec 28 03:01:35 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/bin/pinentry /opt/bin//pinentry
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/bin/pinentry-tty /opt/bin//pinentry-tty
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/bin/pinentry-curses /opt/bin//pinentry-curses
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//info
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/share/info/dir /opt/share//info/dir
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pinentry-1.2.1/share/info/pinentry.info /opt/share//info/pinentry.info
